data.name: SCUM Supporter Pack 2
data.detailed_description:
To mark the halfway point of our Early Access development we are excited to present SCUM supporter pack #2! By popular demand we are releasing another round of extra goodies for wonderful people that wish to further support SCUM development.

Items presented are here for visual presentation and cosmetics and make no impact on the gameplay in any meaningful way.

Movie script.

  • If you want to know more about the lore of SCUM, we are happy to provide! Presenting an idea that was bubbling and we are now comfortable to present to the world. Meet the key characters, the world, and events that lead to the current situation on the TEC01 island. Who knows maybe even meet a future NPC or two!

Dance emotes

  • You see yourself as a person that can just kick back with your clanmates or random players in one of our famous nightclubs and throw a party, or add that extra insult to injury after a satisfying kill? The new dance emotes are here to make that dream happen. Show of your moves with brand new dance emotes!

Music player

  • Ever wanted to have some music playing while you get to that next POI and decided to walk? Maybe you have some wood to gather to upgrade your base walls and want to fill that empty space with our amazing radio stations? Personal Music player is now available as software update for your personal BCU.
    Whether you enjoy the radio or, and yes it is possible, want to add your own: you are now able to have soundtrack wherever you go.

Photo mode

  • A popular feature that will allow all of you creative people to utilize our beautiful island for creative screenshots. Complemented with free look camera, different settings and poses. It even works in the multiplayer with your squadmates!

Thank you from the bottom of our hearts for all your support as we develop the best survival experience for you - Gamepires Team
